IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.accept_repeat_quest') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.accept_repeat_quest GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.accept_repeat_quest @character_id dbo.id_t, @quest_code dbo.id_t, @accept_at SMALLDATETIME AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DELETE FROM dbo.complete_repeat_quests WHERE character_id = @character_id AND @quest_code = quest_code INSERT INTO dbo.Accept_Repeat_Quests(character_id, quest_code, accept_at) VALUES(@character_id, @quest_code, @accept_at)
SET NOCOUNT OFF
